Camera - Class in affichage
The Camera class represents the viewpoint and configuration of a camera.

color - package color
 
Color - Class in triplet
The Color class represents a color using RGB values.
Color(double, double, double) - Constructor for class triplet.Color
Creates a Color object with the specified RGB values.
Color(Triplet) - Constructor for class triplet.Color
Creates a Color object from an existing RGB Triplet.
ColorDamier - Class in color
The ColorDamier class is an implementation of the IColorStrategy interface that provides a checkerboard pattern of colors.
ColorDamier(Color, Color, int) - Constructor for class color.ColorDamier
Constructs a ColorDamier object with the specified colors and grid size.
ColorUnie - Class in color
The ColorUnie class is an implementation of the IColorStrategy interface that provides a uniform color across all pixels.
ColorUnie(Color) - Constructor for class color.ColorUnie
Constructs a ColorUnie object with the specified constant color.
convertModelColorToAwtColor(double, double, double) - Method in class calcul.Lambert
Converts a color in the Model.Color format to an AWT color representation.
convertModelColorToAwtColor(double, double, double) - Method in class calcul.Normal
Converts a color in the Model.Color format to an AWT color representation.
